description: Incremental tweak of baseline policy; slightly more conservative liquidity buffer and same urgency to preserve 100% settlement while aiming to reduce overdraft cost.

on_true.description: Release urgent payments regardless of liquidity buffer check.
Release when there is enough effective liquidity including the buffer.

on_false.description: Hold non-urgent payments when liquidity is tight to avoid overdraft cost.
For non-urgent payments, require effective_liquidity to cover amount times a safety buffer to limit overdrafts.

payment_tree.description: Urgent payments (close to deadline) always released to avoid deadline penalties and end-of-day risk.

bank_tree.description: No dynamic bank-level state or release budget logic for this simple scenario.

strategic_collateral_tree.description: Do not actively post or withdraw collateral in this low-complexity scenario; rely on existing liquidity.

end_of_tick_collateral_tree.description: End-of-tick: keep collateral position unchanged to avoid collateral cost churn.
